div.p: To [the Royal Commissioners for the Intercolonial Exhibition]
P67/474, unit 381, VPRS 3991 inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Office, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: MS written by E. B. Heyne and signed and dated by M.

div.p:
was handed to the Commissioners for the Intercolonial Exhibition on 5/2/66.
Account not found.

This A/m is included in the annexed Account for the whole of the fruit models made,
T. Thomas to M, 30 October 1866. so that the one mentioned above will have to be [annulled].

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
